summary:
CHSBHC conversion of the Memeru Outfit by anano : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18802
(endorse the original modder, not me :)
descriptionHtml:
CHSBHC conversion of the Memeru Outfit by anano : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18802
(endorse the original modder, not me :)

[This mod [b]ONLY[/b] changes the cuirass, skirt, puffy pants, neck-lace .nif\'s.  I had trouble with the esp so everything you need is in this file  :( ]

[b]Requirements[/b]: 

-endorse the original mod here : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18802
-this mod, only full weight supported (because tests have me running ragged  :(  )

[b]Suggestions[/b]:

-Get some sweet textures for this thing.  Pass me a link too.
-the dovahbear backpacks: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17539
-roleplay the cheese out of this thing  :)

[b]Installation[/b]: 
-fire up this mod, ([i]uses same esp format as original, so will erase the original mod if it\'s installed prior[/i]).
    Hopefully NMM compatible :D

[b]Known Issues[/b]: 

-some clipping when jumping, turning quickly, perhaps posing (?)
-PM me if there are any texture issues, I tried to play with original
  esp but it didn\'t like me much.
author: anano
